Title: Attachment Rails
Description: These rails allow for optical modules to be mounted where necessary, including camera sights or night vision modules. They also double as a crude carrying handle.

Title: Sensor Package
Description: Your weapon comes with an integrated flashlight, making it usable at night, aboard damaged spacecraft, or in other low-visibility situations. In situations where stealth is a mission requirement, you can rely on the integrated IR camera to detect signs of life without revealing your position.

Title: Pulse Laser
Description: The laser lens is manufactured using advanced materials to protect it from abrasion. These same materials also allow you to fire the weapon even while the lens is wet or dirty, allowing you to use it in any environment without worry.
